import classNames from "classnames"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useUploadLectureVideoMutation } from "services/courses"; import type { MediaRequest, MediaResponse } from "services/courses"; import { useAppSelector } from "store/hooks"; import { selectLocationPayload } from "state/location/selectors"; import * as client from 'filestack-js'; import { UploadProgress } from "./UploadProgress"; const filestack = client.Filestack(process.env.REACT_APP_FILESTACK_APP_KEY, {}) export const UploadVideo = ({ onSuccess }) => { const [active, setActive] = useState(false) const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false) const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0) const locationPayload = useAppSelector(selectLocationPayload); const [uploadLectureVideo] = useUploadLectureVideoMutation() const onProgress = eve => { setProgress(eve.totalPercent) } const onUpload = (files, { onProgress }) => { setUploading(true) filestack.upload(files, { onProgress }) .then( async (res) => { console.log(res) const media = { name: res.name, filetype: res.name, key: res.handle, size: res.size, course: locationPayload.id } try { const result = await uploadLectureVideo(media).unwrap(); const obj = { ...result, url: res.url} onSuccess(obj) setUploading(false) } catch(err) { console.log(err) } }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
  • setActive(!active)} aria-controls="media-asset-creator-pane-1" aria-selected="true" > Upload Video
  • setActive(!active)} aria-controls="media-asset-creator-pane-2" aria-selected="false" tabIndex={-1} > Add from library
{uploading ? : (
onUpload(event.target.files[0], { onProgress })} id="file-upload-12--26" className="sr-only" />
Note: All files should be at least 720p and less than 4.0 GB.
